system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Spears)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.5F79UHqSJAuVoovG]{Spear Martial Arts}

Benefits

When wielding a halberd, long spear, rifle bayonet, or short spear, the character gains an additional 5 feet of reach with the weapon. Also, when wielding a halberd, long spear, rifle bayonet, or short spear every square that the spear can attack has a doubled movement Combat Point cost for any hostile creatures. This effect does not stack.
system.summary: +5' reach, double movement cost in threatened squares
